title: Unable to reconstruct tracks from tracklets given.
body:
OS: MacOS Big Sur 11.3.1 DeepLabCut Version: 2.2rc1 Anaconda env used: Yes, DLC-CPU When I try to refine some of my tracklets I am unable to create the tracks in the first place. When I load in the `_el.pickle` in the GUI and press "Step1: Create Tracks" on the "Refine tracklets" tab I get an error. Most of the tracklets work, but I get this error with about a dozen of them. And the detections video for each of them seems to show enough points for all 8 of the fish.
Code output

/Users/Ben/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/refine_training_dataset/stitch.py:634: UserWarning: No optimal solution found. Employing black magic... warnings.warn("No optimal solution found. Employing black magic...") Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/Ben/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/refine_training_dataset/stitch.py", line 631, in stitch _, self.flow = nx.capacity_scaling(self.G) File "/Users/Ben/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/networkx/algorithms/flow/capacityscaling.py", line 373, in capacity_scaling raise nx.NetworkXUnfeasible('No flow satisfying all demands.') networkx.exception.NetworkXUnfeasible: No flow satisfying all demands. During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/Ben/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/refine_training_dataset/stitch.py", line 697, in stitch raise NotImplementedError NotImplementedError During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/Ben/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/gui/refine_tracklets.py", line 318, in create_tracks animal_names=self.cfg["individuals"], File "/Users/Ben/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/refine_training_dataset/stitch.py", line 1007, in stitch_tracklets stitcher.stitch() File "/Users/Ben/opt/anaconda3/envs/DLC-CPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/refine_training_dataset/stitch.py", line 702, in stitch f"Could not reconstruct {self.n_tracks} tracks from the tracklets given." ValueError: Could not reconstruct 8 tracks from the tracklets given.

I have attached here one of the pickle files that I am unable to create tracks from as a zip file, since github does not seem to like .pickle files. I also have the video with points at the Tufts Box link. [2020_7_28_27_TN_DN_F0_V1DLC_resnet50_DLC_2-2_4P_8F_Light_VentralMay10shuffle1_100000_el.pickle.zip](https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/files/6517291/2020_7_28_27_TN_DN_F0_V1DLC_resnet50_DLC_2-2_4P_8F_Light_VentralMay10shuffle1_100000_el.pickle.zip) https://tufts.box.com/s/kb4sgkcyyjcr9atn0hr0levwp4yg5gyk
